actions.committee: Committee on Commerce, Science, and Transportation
actions.text: Referred to the Committee on Commerce, Science, and Transportation.

official_title: A resolution expressing the support of the Senate for the establishment of an Urban Youth Sport Initiative in partnership with the United States Olympic Committee.
subjects: Urban and suburban affairs and development

summary.text: Expresses support for: (1) the expansion of quality urban youth sports programs to increase urban youth involvement in sport; and (2) the establishment of an Urban Youth Sport Initiative in partnership with the U.S. Olympic Committee.

titles.title: A resolution expressing the support of the Senate for the establishment of an Urban Youth Sport Initiative in partnership with the United States Olympic Committee.
